titleStmt.title: The eunuch. A tragedy: as it hath been acted with great applause. / Written by William Hemmings, Oxon..
titleStmt.author: Hemings, William, b. 1602?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor near Stationers-Hall,,

notesStmt.note: The copy of this item at reel 868:15 is incorrectly identified as Wing H1521.
Reproductions of originals in Huntington Library (reel 868:15), and Newberry Library (reel 2247:6).
